verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: stopped] [ARG1: using my phone] [ARGM-TMP: for 2 hours] [ARGM-TMP: before bed] and it had a more powerful effect than i expected phone use right before bed could be negatively impacting our sleep quality since i have trouble sleeping i decided to stop looking at my phone for two hours before bed for a two - week period as a result i slept better spent more quality time with my husband and felt less anxious about work netflix
